players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I investigated her last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote for Diana to save the town."
You: "I'm a villager and I'm really confused right now. Bob is dead, and Diana and Charlie are accusing each other of being the mafia. I don't know who to believe."
Diana: "Alice, think logically. If Charlie were the detective, he would have investigated someone else Night 1, not me. He's lying to save himself. Vote Charlie."

You: "I'm still very confused. Bob is dead, and both Diana and Charlie claim to be the detective and accuse each other of being the mafia. I don't have any special abilities, so I need to rely on what you all say. Diana, you said..."
Charlie: "Diana is clearly lying. As the real detective, I investigated her and she's mafia. Alice, trust me and vote Diana to save the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
